name: jekyll-uikit
description: *Minima is a one-size-fits-all Jekyll theme for writers*. It's Jekyll's default (and first) theme. It's what you get when you run `jekyll new`.

scripts.copy: ncp node_modules/uikit/src/scss/ _sass/uikit/ & ncp node_modules/system-font-css/ _sass/system-font-css/ & ncp node_modules/uikit/dist/js/uikit.min.js assets/js/uikit.min.js & ncp node_modules/uikit/dist/js/uikit-icons.min.js assets/js/uikit-icons.min.js & ncp node_modules/simple-jekyll-search/dest/simple-jekyll-search.min.js assets/js/simple-jekyll-search.min.js
